code: import React,{useState}from'react';import emptyHeart from'./emptyHeart.png';import filledHeart from'./filledHeart.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeartToggle=()=>{const[isFilled,setIsFilled]=useState(false);const toggleHeart=()=>{setIsFilled(!isFilled);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:toggleHeart,style:{cursor:'pointer'},children:isFilled?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:filledHeart,alt:"Filled Heart",style:{width:'50px',height:'50px'}}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:emptyHeart,alt:"Empty Heart",style:{width:'50px',height:'50px'}})});};export default HeartToggle;
